name: Never Enough A's
description:
SPACE is a vast and wonderful place. Everything you love is in SPAACE. You are in SPAAACE. But we can never have enough SPAAAACE. Particularly the A's!

Status

Never Enough A's is the first game I've released, so feedback is welcome! I had this silly idea that I wipped up in a few days, will probably update with a cleaner version in about a month. If folks enjoy it I'll keep polishing it and expanding the gameplay.

How to Play
  • Start the game above in your browser (downloadable version coming shortly)
  • W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar or P (un)pauses the game
  • (Technically supports touch/drag events to move, but very buggy in this first version)
  • Move around, avoid squares, collect A's
Potential Development Path
  • Item drops, levels, upgrades
  • More alien types
  • An Options menu to control volume and other do-dads
  • More weapon types for the player
  • Actual pixel art for the player/enemies
  • Improve the gameplay, and overall balance and difficulty scaling
  • More sound effects and UI feedback
  • Potential other changes you suggest
  • Whatever ideas I wake up with in the middle of the night
Known Bugs (As of DEMO version)
  • Touch/Drag Events are not super responsive
  • Restarting the game sometimes doesn’t render the player (refresh the page to fix)
  • Instead of looping around and following an enemy, sometimes the player’s purple bullet “gets high and dances” off to the side
  • please report other bugs, and thoughts in general, in the comments below
